name: part_014
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Ending performance of 'Sparkle' and transition to the next song.
Performance of 'Toki no Ame, Saishuu Sensou' by Murasaki Shion.
Performance of 'Tada Koe Hitotsu' by Murasaki Shion.

subtitles.original: Oh...
subtitles.english: Oh...

subtitles.original:
時ノ雨、最終戦争
作詞・作曲：Orangostar
subtitles.english:
Rain of Time, Final War
Lyrics/Composition: Orangostar

subtitles.original: 答えて　ねぇ
subtitles.english: Answer me, hey

subtitles.original: にわか雨が寄せる街の夜へ
subtitles.english: Into the city night where a sudden shower approaches

subtitles.original: 沈む世界　感覚　そこ
subtitles.english: A sinking world, at the bottom of sensation

subtitles.original: きっと僕ら生まれながら
subtitles.english: Surely we, since the moment we were born

subtitles.original: 何処にもないコタエを探してる
subtitles.english: Have been searching for an answer that exists nowhere

subtitles.original: 応えて　ねぇ
subtitles.english: Answer me, hey

subtitles.original: 叶えて　何を
subtitles.english: Grant me... what?

subtitles.original: 今日の世界はいかがです
subtitles.english: How is today's world?

subtitles.original: きっと言われずとも君は
subtitles.english: Surely even without being told

subtitles.original: 君を知っているだろうとも
subtitles.english: You already know yourself

subtitles.original: けどまだ信じられぬだろう
subtitles.english: But you probably still can't believe it

subtitles.original: 終わる日々の果て
subtitles.english: At the end of these closing days

subtitles.original: 泣きだした空の彼方
subtitles.english: Beyond the sky that started to cry

subtitles.original: 終わらない善と悪の祭典
subtitles.english: A never-ending festival of good and evil

subtitles.original: なんてざま期待もないなって
subtitles.english: What a mess, I have no expectations

subtitles.original: 君は君をかき消した
subtitles.english: And you erased yourself

subtitles.original: 時の流れに希望さえ
subtitles.english: In a world where even hope

subtitles.original: 描けない世界で
subtitles.english: Cannot be drawn in the passage of time

subtitles.original: 正しさなんて誰にもわかんないから
subtitles.english: Because no one knows what's right

subtitles.original: 君は何を願ってもいいの
subtitles.english: It's okay for you to wish for anything

subtitles.original: いいの
subtitles.english: It's okay

subtitles.original: コタエは無いよ
subtitles.english: There is no answer

subtitles.original: 僕のことなどきっと僕はまだ
subtitles.english: About me, surely I still

subtitles.original: 悲しさの木霊する
subtitles.english: Echo with sadness

subtitles.original: 孤独の中遠く浮かぶ
subtitles.english: Floating far away in loneliness

subtitles.original: 昨日は...
subtitles.english: Yesterday was...

subtitles.original: 今日で世界は終わります
subtitles.english: The world ends today

subtitles.original: 君が拒めどその暮れに
subtitles.english: Even if you refuse, in that twilight

subtitles.original: 咲かせ死に花
subtitles.english: Let the flowers of death bloom

subtitles.original: 成るは厭なり想いは成らず
subtitles.english: It becomes pitiful, thoughts do not come true

subtitles.original: 君の全てはね
subtitles.english: Everything about you, you see

subtitles.original: 止まない憂いの最中
subtitles.english: In the midst of unending sorrow

subtitles.original: 二つ感情は対を成して
subtitles.english: Two emotions form a pair

subtitles.original: 願いを放つ君は覚えてるかな
subtitles.english: And release a wish. Do you remember,

subtitles.original: あの日涙の意味を
subtitles.english: The meaning of the tears that day?

subtitles.original: この世はまだ終わらない
subtitles.english: This world is not over yet

subtitles.original: 明けぬ夜か今日咲いてたって
subtitles.english: Even if the night doesn't end and today blooms

subtitles.original: 僕は書き換えじゃないって
subtitles.english: That I'm not a replacement

subtitles.original: 咲く雷　空が晴れる
subtitles.english: The thunderous sky clears up

subtitles.original: 泣き止んだ今日にさらば
subtitles.english: Farewell to today when the crying stopped

subtitles.original: 変わらない想いを振り翳すように
subtitles.english: I will live as if brandishing

subtitles.original: 生きていく　泣きながらでいいさ
subtitles.english: My unchanging feelings. It's okay to cry,

subtitles.original: それを繰り返して笑える生涯
subtitles.english: Repeat it for a lifetime you can laugh at

subtitles.original: また明日の雨に打たれたって
subtitles.english: Even if you're hit by tomorrow's rain again

subtitles.original: いつかこの世に生まれてきて
subtitles.english: So that someday you'll be able to say

subtitles.original: 良かったって言えるようになるから
subtitles.english: You're glad you were born into this world

subtitles.original: その日まで
subtitles.english: Until that day

subtitles.original: 負けないよ
subtitles.english: I won't lose

subtitles.original: 負けないよ
subtitles.english: I won't lose

subtitles.original:
ただ声一つ
作詞・作曲：MIMI
subtitles.english:
Just One Voice
Lyrics/Composition: MIMI

subtitles.original: 続く時間の欠片を
subtitles.english: Collecting fragments

subtitles.original: 集めている
subtitles.english: Of continuing time

subtitles.original: ただ過ぎるノートの
subtitles.english: Writing in the blank space

subtitles.original: 余白に書く
subtitles.english: Of a notebook that's just passing
